node.title: $10 Monday 8PM Suburb (Schaumburg) Soccer - 9v9, 2 Hours
node.description:
**With the weather warming up, we're headed back outdoors to Olympic Park**
We know there’s lots of players in the suburbs who are looking to play and we’re super excited to be hosting eight additional games in May

**Event Details**

* **Location**: Olympic Park Field #8 in Schaumburg
* **Field**: Turf
* **Team Structure:** 9v9
* **Payment**: $10 to Michael Wang (payment is due 2 days before the event, any attendees who haven't paid will be moved from the going list)
* ***VENMO:*** @wangchang
***ZELLE:*** 617 538 1164

Please arrive on time, pay before playing, be kind to each other and yourself, and have fun!
If you have any questions, ask the community on NBHD Soccer Discord or in the chat.
\-\-\-
**Support**
*We are looking for*

* Volunteers to help organize events
* Volunteers to support marketing efforts
* Partners to host more events
* Sponsors

##

node.title: $10TUE. 8:00PM YMCA Rauner Indoor COED Pickup Soccer
node.description:
**Sign up for our Tuesday Pickup!**

* NBHD is an organization that is passionate about community-driven pickup soccer.
* Want support from NBHD? Ask on the [Chicago Neighborhood Soccer Community discord server!! ](https://discord.gg/rhfCzz3Gfj)

**FORMAT**

* Large Goals with Goalie
* 8v8

**PAYMENTS**

* VENMO: ***NBHDsoccer***
* ZELLE: ***adpared@gmail.com***

**Thank you for your support and community. We are looking for**

* Volunteers to help organize events
* Volunteers to help marketing efforts
* Partners to host more events
* Sponsors

node.title: $10 THURS. 8:00PM YMCA Rauner COED Pickup Soccer
node.description:
**Sign up for our Thursday Pickup!**

Be sure to grab your spot by RSVP-ing on meetup as there are limited spots available. Be sure to send payment before attending the event for confirmation of attendance and faster check ins.

**Pricing**
$10 per person
Please send payment to either of the following *before* attending:

* venmo - ***NBHDsoccer***
* zelle - **nbhdsoccer@gmail.com**

**What To Expect**
Please arrive \~10 min early so that we can start getting teams of 8 together to start playing by 8 p.m.

**Level of Play**
We welcome all levels of skill! We want you to work on your own fitness/soccer journey and have fun while doing it in a safe and friendly environment.We are co-ed with no gender ratio required.

We do our best creating evenly matched teams. There are no referees - we expect players to show some sportsmanship and make their own calls. Be kind to each other and yourself!

Please bring your own water bottle! There are also water fountains available in the facility.

**Minimum Number of Players and Playing Formats**
This event needs a minimum of 21 people signed up 2 hours before the start of the event in order to run. An email notification will be sent 2 hours in advance if we need to cancel. Credits will be issued if we cancel the event. Sign up early to encourage more people to sign up!

**Do Your Part! Help us keep an accurate guest count!**
If you sign up, we're counting on you to be there and stay the whole time. You can cancel 2 or more hours to receive a game credit for future use. Cancellations made less than 2 hours before game time will not receive a credit.

**What's included in the price?**
Chicago NBHD Soccer is a non-profit organization- the money that is collected goes right back into our community. We use it to cover field rental costs, equipment and everything else that will help us deliver a quality and well organized event.

**Questions?**
Please reach out to us via [Discord](https://discord.gg/WtCfSRr9Dn), [instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nbhdsoccer/), or comment/message us through the meetup event!

**Support**
Thank you for your continued support and generosity - you are the reason we are able to provide a space to do what we do! Additional contributions are alway welcomed and will always be used to make our events better!
We are always looking for volunteers, partners, and/or any help to help us deliver a great pickup soccer experience to as many people as possible.

node.title: $5 FRIDAY 8PM-PILSEN COED Pick up Soccer (Small Goals)
node.description:
**Our Friday night pickup soccer is special.**
We get big numbers and try our best to scale to let everyone play, AND we aim to do it fair and orderly.

* Check in with one of the organizers (Andre, Diego, Jordan, & Julian)
* Show us proof of payment
* Get your bib
* The earlier you get there and check in, the faster you can get to playing
* 1 field means 4 teams; 2 fields means 6 teams, & 3 fields (7-8 teams)

**Host**: NBHD Soccer
**Location:** Harrison Park in the Pilsen Neighborhood
**Equipment**: Goals, Bibs, and music provided to you while we organize
**Format**: 7v7, 8v8, 9v9, as multiple games as needed.
\- This is event is no limit and scale to meet need
\- Please arrive early and please respect the RSVP
\- Please keep the environment fun and safe\!
\- Be competitive\, supportive\, and respectful to each other

**Note on $ / Support**
$5 a person will help compensate for maintenance fees and help us grow: buy bigger goals, host more events, and film the meetups as a service!
This is all made possible through to your continued generosity to support. You can pay, and make additional contributions here:

* ***VENMO: NBHDsoccer***
* ***Zelle: adpared@gmail.com***
* ***CASH: is not preferred but will be accepted.***

Join the [discord ](https://discord.gg/rhfCzz3Gfj)to learn how to get involved on and off the pitch.
\- Instagram: @NBHDsoccer
**\- We have a [Mission and Vision](https://github.com/OpenFutbol/chicago-neighborhood-soccer/wiki).** *Star the Github repo, under [OpenFutbol](https://github.com/OpenFutbol).*
